triples.name: Collision avoidance system
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel method for collision avoidance constraints using optimization techniques.

triples.name: Convex optimization
triples.relevance: The method leverages strong duality of convex optimization to reformulate collision avoidance constraints.

triples.name: Duality (optimization)
triples.relevance: Strong duality is used as the theoretical foundation for the exact reformulation of nondifferentiable constraints.

triples.name: Trajectory optimization
triples.relevance: The paper applies the collision avoidance framework to trajectory optimization and planning tasks.

triples.name: Gradient descent
triples.relevance: The smooth reformulation enables the use of gradient-based optimization algorithms for solving trajectory planning problems.

triples.name: Signed distance function
triples.relevance: The paper connects its reformulation with the notion of signed distance used in traditional trajectory generation algorithms.
